author.html: Hi, I am Mauricio Salatino also known as Salaboy. I am a Staff Software Engineer at VMWare for the Knative project. I used to work for LearnK8s as a Kubernetes instructor and previously worked for Red Hat/JBoss. I have been working with Kubernetes for the last five years, training teams and developing cloud-native applications. I’ve participated in several open-source projects including Zeebe, Jhipster, Spring Cloud and Jenkins X and Knative. Previously, I’ve worked at Red Hat/JBoss in the Business Automation Engineering department. I’m also a CD Foundation Ambassador, and co-chair of the CD Best Practices SIG. I have presented at KubeCon and another international conferences, you can find more about me here
author.name: Mauricio Salatino
